Entries.Utility.cs.5371: @... Pilla... #$b# As the mayor of Pelican Town, and regional bearer of the matrimonial seal, I now pronounce you husband and wife!$h
Entries.Utility.cs.5377: @... Pilla... #$b# As the mayor of Pelican Town, and regional bearer of the matrimonial seal, I now pronounce you wife and..., well, wife!$h
Entries.Utility.cs.5367: When @ first arrived in Pelican Town, no one knew if he'd fit in with our community...#$b#But from this day forward, @ is going to be as much a part of this town as any of us!$h#$b#It is my great honor on this day {0} of {1}, to unite @ and Pilla in the bonds of marriage.
Entries.Utility.cs.5369: When @ first arrived in Pelican Town, no one knew if she'd fit in with our community...#$b#But from this day forward, @ is going to be as much a part of this town as any of us!$h#$b#It is my great honor on this day {0} of {1}, to unite @ and Pilla in the bonds of marriage.

Entries.958564/f Pilla 1000/t 800 1300/w sunny: playful/39 13/farmer 53 14 3 Pilla 39 11 2/skippable/showFrame Pilla 29/move farmer -14 0 3/speak Pilla "OH!"/jump farmer/faceDirection farmer 0/speak Pilla "Hey @.."/emote farmer 40/move farmer 0 -2 0/speak Pilla "I have something to say."/pause 500/speak Pilla "I uh..."/emote farmer 8/speak Pilla "If I had the last pizza, I'd give it to you."/emote farmer 16/jump farmer/faceDirection farmer 2/emote farmer 60/animate Pilla false true 330 30 31 30 31/speak Pilla "What I mean is uh..I like sharing food with someone who is special to me."/stopAnimation Pilla/showFrame Pilla 29/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 500/speak Pilla "I like you, a lot. And I.."/pause 500/speak Pilla "I'm just..maybe..*sigh*"/faceDirection farmer 2/emote farmer 60/faceDirection farmer 0/speak Pilla "I just never thought it'd come to this with my feelings about someone."/pause 500/speak Pilla "I'll come visit you today at your place..after dark,I want to cook for you."/move Pilla 20 0 1 true/faceDirection farmer 1/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end
